chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
R: SRS
x0: string
a0: symbol
x: list symbol

Goal:
x <<= Sigma -> rewt P x [a0] -> exists y : string, rewt R x y /\ a0 el y

Premises:
Notation string := (SR.string symbol)
Notation Sigma := (a0 :: x0 ++ sym R)
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive rewt (X : Type) (R : SR.SRS X) : SR.string X -> SR.string X -> Prop := rewR : forall z : SR.string X, rewt R z z | rewS : forall x y z : SR.string X, rew R x y -> rewt R y z -> rewt R x z Arguments rewt {X}%type_scope Arguments rewR {X}%type_scope Arguments rewS {X}%type_scope
P = R ++ [[a; a0] / [a0] | a ∈ Sigma] ++ [[a0; a] / [a0] | a ∈ Sigma] : list (string * string)
x_rewt_a0 : forall x : list symbol, a0 el x -> x <<= Sigma -> rewt P x [a0]
SRH = fun '(R / x / a) => exists y : string, rewt R x y /\ a el y : SRS * string * symbol -> Prop
rewt_sym : forall (R : Definitions.stack) (x y : Definitions.string) (Sigma : list symbol), sym R <<= Sigma -> x <<= Sigma -> rewt R x y -> y <<= Sigma
TSRH = fun '(R / x / a) => exists y : string, rewt (R ++ [swap p | p ∈ R]) x y /\ a el y : SRS * string * symbol -> Prop
rewt_a0_R : forall x : list symbol, x <<= Sigma -> rewt P (x ++ [a0]) [a0]
rewt_a0_L : forall x : list symbol, x <<= Sigma -> rewt P (a0 :: x) [a0]
rewt_subset : forall (R P : Definitions.stack) (x y : Definitions.string), rewt R x y -> R <<= P -> rewt P x y
rewt_induct : forall (R : Definitions.SRS) (z : Definitions.string) (P : Definitions.string -> Prop), P z -> (forall x y : Definitions.string, rew R x y -> rewt R y z -> P y -> P x) -> forall s : string, rewt R s z -> P s
rewS : forall (R0 : SR.SRS ?X) (x1 y z : SR.string ?X), rew R0 x1 y -> rewt R0 y z -> rewt R0 x1 z where ?X : [R : SRS x0 : string a0 : symbol x : list symbol |- Type]
rewt_left : forall (R : Definitions.stack) (x y z : Definitions.string), rewt R x y -> rew R y z -> rewt R x z
SR = fun '(R / x / y) => rewt R x y : SRS * string * string -> Prop
rewt_sind : forall (X : Type) (R : SR.SRS X) (P : SR.string X -> SR.string X -> SProp), (forall z : SR.string X, P z z) -> (forall x y z : SR.string X, rew R x y -> rewt R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall s s0 : SR.string X, rewt R s s0 -> P s s0
rewt_ind : forall (X : Type) (R : SR.SRS X) (P : SR.string X -> SR.string X -> Prop), (forall z : SR.string X, P z z) -> (forall x y z : SR.string X, rew R x y -> rewt R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall s s0 : SR.string X, rewt R s s0 -> P s s0
rewt_ind' : forall (X : Type) (R : SR.SRS X) (P : forall s s0 : SR.string X, rewt R s s0 -> Prop), (forall z : SR.string X, P z z (rewR R z)) -> (forall (x y z : SR.string X) (r : rew R x y) (r0 : rewt R y z), P y z r0 -> P x z (rewS R x y z r r0)) -> forall (s s0 : SR.string X) (r : rewt R s s0), P s s0 r
rew_subset : forall (R P : Definitions.SRS) (x y : Definitions.string), rew R x y -> R <<= P -> rew P x y
rewt_app_L : forall (R : Definitions.stack) (x x' y : Definitions.string), rewt R x x' -> rewt R (y ++ x) (y ++ x')
TSR = fun '(R / x / y) => rewt (R ++ [swap p | p ∈ R]) x y : SRS * string * string -> Prop
PCP.MPCP = fun '(x / y / P) => exists A : PCP.stack symbol, A <<= x / y :: P /\ x ++ PCP.tau1 A = y ++ PCP.tau2 A : PCP.card symbol * PCP.stack symbol -> Prop
PCP.MPCPb = fun '(x / y / P) => exists A : PCP.stack bool, A <<= x / y :: P /\ x ++ PCP.tau1 A = y ++ PCP.tau2 A : PCP.card bool * PCP.stack bool -> Prop
rewR : forall (R0 : SR.SRS ?X) (z : SR.string ?X), rewt R0 z z where ?X : [R : SRS x0 : string a0 : symbol x : list symbol |- Type]
split_inv : forall (X : Type) (u z x y : list X) (s : X), u ++ z = x ++ s :: y -> ~ s el u -> exists x' : list X, x = u ++ x'
list_prefix_inv' : forall (X : Type) (a a' : X) (x u y v : list X), ~ a' el x -> ~ a el u -> x ++ a :: y = u ++ a' :: v -> a = a' /\ x = u /\ y = v
PCP.derivable_ind : forall (X : Type) (P : PCP.stack X) (P0 : PCP.string X -> PCP.string X -> Prop), (forall x y : list X, x / y el P -> P0 x y) -> (forall (x y : list X) (u v : PCP.string X), x / y el P -> PCP.derivable P u v -> P0 u v -> P0 (x ++ u) (y ++ v)) -> forall s s0 : PCP.string X, PCP.derivable P s s0 -> P0 s s0
PCP.derivable_sind : forall (X : Type) (P : PCP.stack X) (P0 : PCP.string X -> PCP.string X -> SProp), (forall x y : list X, x / y el P -> P0 x y) -> (forall (x y : list X) (u v : PCP.string X), x / y el P -> PCP.derivable P u v -> P0 u v -> P0 (x ++ u) (y ++ v)) -> forall s s0 : PCP.string X, PCP.derivable P s s0 -> P0 s s0
Inductive derivable (X : Type) (P : PCP.stack X) : PCP.string X -> PCP.string X -> Prop := der_sing : forall x y : list X, x / y el P -> PCP.derivable P x y | der_cons : forall (x y : list X) (u v : PCP.string X), x / y el P -> PCP.derivable P u v -> PCP.derivable P (x ++ u) (y ++ v) Arguments PCP.derivable {X}%type_scope Arguments PCP.der_sing {X}%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments PCP.der_cons {X}%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope
list_prefix_inv : forall (X : Type) (a : X) (x u y v : list X), ~ a el x -> ~ a el u -> x ++ a :: y = u ++ a :: v -> x = u /\ y = v
in_remove : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x y : A), x el remove eq_dec y l -> x el l /\ x <> y
list_prefix_inv'' : forall (X : Type) (a : X) (x u y v : list X), ~ a el u -> ~ a el v -> x ++ a :: y = u ++ a :: v -> x = u /\ y = v
app_eq_unit : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a : A), x ++ y = [a] -> x = [] /\ y = [a] \/ x = [a] /\ y = []
do_rew : forall (R : Definitions.SRS) (x1 x2 x y : Definitions.string) (u v : string), u / v el R -> x1 = x ++ u ++ y -> x2 = x ++ v ++ y -> rew R x1 x2
sym_map : forall (X : Type) (f : X -> Definitions.card) (l : list X) (Sigma : list symbol), (forall x : X, x el l -> sym [f x] <<= Sigma) -> sym [f p | p ∈ l] <<= Sigma
in_map_iff : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (y : B), y el [f p | p ∈ l] < -> (exists x : A, f x = y /\ x el l)
in_in_remove : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x y : A), x <> y -> x el l -> x el remove eq_dec y l
rewB : forall (R0 : SR.SRS ?X) (x1 y : list ?X) (u v : SR.string ?X), u / v el R0 -> rew R0 (x1 ++ u ++ y) (x1 ++ v ++ y) where ?X : [R : SRS x0 : string a0 : symbol x : list symbol |- Type]
app_inj_tail : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a b : A), x ++ [a] = y ++ [b] -> x = y /\ a = b
in_elt_inv : forall (A : Type) (x y : A) (l1 l2 : list A), x el l1 ++ y :: l2 -> x = y \/ x el l1 ++ l2
Exists_exists : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), Exists P l < -> (exists x : A, x el l /\ P x)
Relation_Operators.Desc_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> Prop), P [] -> (forall x : A, P [x]) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ [y]) -> P (l ++ [y]) -> P ((l ++ [y]) ++ [x])) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
Relation_Operators.Desc_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> SProp), P [] -> (forall x : A, P [x]) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ [y]) -> P (l ++ [y]) -> P ((l ++ [y]) ++ [x])) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
Inductive clos_refl (A : Type) (R : Relation_Definitions.relation A) (x : A) : A -> Prop := r_step : forall y : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl A R x y | r_refl : Relation_Operators.clos_refl A R x x Arguments Relation_Operators.clos_refl _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.r_step _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.r_refl _%type_scope

```coq
intros.
apply rewt_sym with (Sigma := Sigma) in H0.
- apply rewt_ind with (P := fun s => exists y, rewt R x y /\ a0 el y) in H0.
  + intros. exists x0. split; auto.
  + intros. destruct H1 as [y [H2 H3]].
    apply SRH with (R := R) (x := x) (a := a0) in H2. destruct H2 as [y' [H4 H5]].
    exists y'. split; auto.
- apply H.
Qed.
Qed.```
